column1: the present invention relates to a brake control circuit and a motor system. the brake control circuit is used for controlling a motor brake connected to a motor, and comprises a brake control input module and a brake control main module, wherein the brake control input module includes a control signal input unit and n relays connected in parallel to an output end of the control signal input unit, the relays are electrically connected to the brake control main module, and n is an integer greater than or equal to 2.
